ygData.subject: Links to other groups
ygData.msgSnippet: Sean and everyone else - I will have to think about it before allowing links to show up to other groups not gladiator related. This is also a warning: before

To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Links to other groups
Message-ID: <9np4dc+caa3@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 707
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Sean and everyone else - I will have to think about it before allowing 
links to show up to other groups not gladiator related.

This is also a warning: before advertising for other groups, *I* 
or Tom Ricket [until Seth Mitchell returns] need to see the group and 
take time to consider it before allowing it.  I'm against splintering 
our community.  I can understand establishing a separate group for 
working on a new scenario editor because of technical issues.  I am 
also state the tournament group's existance is justified because there 
 needs to be private discussion in certain matters and the tournament 
group is NOT intended nor will become a magnet for drawing people away 
 from this group.
